import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { public transactions?: Transaction[]; constructor(http: HttpClient) { http.get('/api/transaction').subscribe(result => { this.transactions = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Transaction { id: number name: string; date: string; cost: number; }
